p: FTIR analysis was performed to clarify whether M2e-specific IgY antibody was conjugated with the ALP enzyme. Figure 4, 5, and 6 indicate the FTIR spectra of M2e-specific IgY antibody, ALP enzyme, and M2e-specific IgY-ALP bioconjugate, respectively. The different characteristic bands that belong to different functional groups have been obtained.
